waddington.kai.main.knnf.layers.neurons

Class Neuron

  • java.lang.Object
    • waddington.kai.main.knnf.layers.neurons.Neuron
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NeuronConvolution, NeuronFlatten, NeuronFullyConnected, NeuronInput, NeuronOutput, NeuronPool

    public abstract class Neuron
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the abstract class that all neuron-type-specific classes extend.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private LayerActivation activation
      The activation type that the neuron uses.
      private org.jblas.DoubleMatrix deltas
      The weight delta(s) for this neuron.
      private org.jblas.DoubleMatrix error
      The error of the network that this neuron is responsible for.
      private int id
      Each neuron has an ID and is it's position in the network.
      private org.jblas.DoubleMatrix inputData
      The input data to the neuron.
      private org.jblas.DoubleMatrix outputData
      The output data from the neuron, the neuron calculates this.
      private LayerType type
      The specific type that the neuron is.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Neuron(int id, LayerType type, LayerActivation activation)
      This is the only constructor that can be used.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Neuron

        public Neuron(int id,
              LayerType type,
              LayerActivation activation)
        This is the only constructor that can be used. Sets the ID, layer type, and activation type of the neuron.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID for the neuron.
        type - The LayerType that the new neuron is.
        activation - The LayerActivation that the neuron will use.

    • Method Detail

      • applyDeltas

        public abstract void applyDeltas()
        Applies the weight deltas.

      • calculateDeltas

        public abstract void calculateDeltas(java.util.List<Neuron> lowerNeurons,
                                     java.util.List<Neuron> upperNeurons)
        Method used to calculate the weight deltas for the neuron.
        Parameters:
        lowerNeurons - A list of neurons in the layer below.
        upperNeurons - A list of neurons in the layer above.

      • getActivation

        public LayerActivation getActivation()
        Get the activation type that the neuron uses.
        Returns:
        The activation type that the neuron uses.

        Returns:
